summary: Frontend QA testing completed for WooASM.ai. All pages load correctly, navigation works, no localhost references found in frontend code. The reported localhost:3000 redirect issue is confirmed to be a BACKEND issue - the checkoutUrl returned by the API contains localhost.

critical.issue: Backend returns localhost:3000 in checkoutUrl field instead of production URL. This is the root cause of the reported billing redirect issue.

minor.issue: Returns 520 error (Cloudflare/backend issue) - pricing page falls back to default plans

backend_issues.note: Backend is external at api.wooasm.com - localhost issue is in backend Stripe configuration

ui_bugs.issue: Mobile menu items overlap with page content when menu is open. Menu items appear on top of hero section instead of in a proper dropdown/overlay.

issues: Mobile menu overlay needs z-index fix or background to prevent content overlap

localhost_audit.frontend_code: CLEAN - No localhost references found in any .js/.jsx files
localhost_audit.billing_page: CORRECT - Uses window.location.href = response.data.checkoutUrl (URL from backend)
localhost_audit.pricing_page: CORRECT - Uses window.location.href = response.data.checkoutUrl (URL from backend)
localhost_audit.root_cause: BACKEND - The checkoutUrl returned by /api/v1/billing/create-checkout contains localhost:3000

tests_executed.details: WooASM branding visible, all sections render
Features, Pricing, Docs, Blog, Login, Signup all visible
3 plans displayed, billing toggle works, CTAs visible
Form elements visible, forgot password link present
Name, email, password, company fields visible
Email input and submit button visible
All 13 footer links present and correct
Features, Docs, Blog, About, Contact, Changelog, Roadmap, Privacy, Terms, Cookies, GDPR all load
Mobile menu button works but menu overlay has z-index issue
No localhost references in frontend code

action_items: CRITICAL: Fix backend /api/v1/billing/create-checkout to return production URL instead of localhost:3000 in checkoutUrl
MEDIUM: Fix mobile menu z-index/overlay in Header.jsx to prevent content overlap
critical_code_review_comments: Frontend code is clean - no localhost references anywhere
API service correctly uses environment variable for backend URL
BillingPage and PricingPage correctly use checkoutUrl from API response
The localhost:3000 issue is 100% a backend configuration issue (likely Stripe success/cancel URL config)
context_for_next_testing_agent: Frontend is clean. The localhost:3000 redirect issue is a BACKEND problem - the Stripe checkout URL returned by the API contains localhost. Backend team needs to update Stripe configuration to use production URLs.

rca_of_issue.reported_issue: Clicking billing buttons redirects to localhost:3000
rca_of_issue.root_cause: Backend API (/api/v1/billing/create-checkout) returns checkoutUrl containing localhost:3000 instead of production URL
evidence: No localhost references in frontend codebase
REACT_APP_BACKEND_URL correctly set to production URL
API calls go to correct production endpoint
rca_of_issue.fix_location: Backend - Stripe configuration for success_url and cancel_url
rca_of_issue.mitigation: Update backend Stripe checkout session creation to use production URLs (wooasm.com) instead of localhost:3000
